about_the_game: This downloadable material (DLC) includes the whole original music of the mascot horror title "MUZY" It lasts 15 minutes and features a wide spectrum of ambient instrumental works ranging from soft and lyrical themes to scary and unsettling tones. The soundtrack smoothly weaves together, creating an immersive auditory experience that pulls the listener into a profoundly sorrowful environment.

The soundtrack smoothly weaves together, creating an immersive auditory experience that pulls the listener into a profoundly sorrowful environment.
